content: to last st on needle yo k1* twice 4 sts increased round 2 *k1 ktbl k to last two sts on needle ktbl k1* twice repeat rnds 1 and 2 until you have 28 32 36 sts on each needle and 56 64 72 sts total ending with a round 2 foot set-up round on needle 1 k13 15 17 c2r k13 15 17 on needle 2 k all sts work foot according to foot chart for your size working the chart on needle 1 and knitting all sts on needle 2 until work measures approx 3 25 3 5 4 inches / 8 9 10 cm shorter than desired length see pattern note #2 gusset round 1 on needle 1 work according to foot chart in your size on needle 2 k1 yo k to last st yo k1 2 sts increased round 2 on needle 1 work according to foot chart in your size on needle 2 k1 ktbl k to last two sts ktbl k1 repeat rnds 1 and 2 until you have 56 64 72 sts on needle 2 and 84 96 108 sts total ending with a round 2 heel turn work next round of chart on needle 1 heel turn will be worked back and forth using short row on needle ​ ​ 2 row 1 rs k37 43 49 yo k1 w&t there should be 18 20 22 sts remaining on left needle counting the wrapped st row 2 ws p1 ptbl p18 22 26 yo p1 w&t there should be 18 20 22 sts remaining on left needle counting the wrapped st row 3 rs k1 ktbl k16 19 22 yo k1 w&t row 4 ws p1 ptbl p14 16 18 yo p1 w&t row 5 rs k1 ktbl k12 13 14 yo k1 w&t row 6 ws p1 ptbl p10 10 10 yo p1 w&t row 7 rs k1 ktbl k8 7 6 yo k1 w&t row 8 ws p1 ptbl p6 4 2 yo p1 w&t row 9 rs k1 ktbl k to end of needle 2 picking up and knitting turn loops with their sts as you come to them © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 3 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens heel flap work next round of chart on needle 1 making note of which round you are on row 1 rs k45 51 57 picking up and knitting turn loops with their sts as you come to them ssk turn you should have 17 19 21 sts remaining on left needle row 2 ws sl1 p26 30 34 sts p2tog turn you should have 17 19 21 sts remaining on left needle row 3 rs sl1 *k1 sl1* 13 15 17 times ssk turn row 4 ws sl1 p26 30 34 sts p2tog turn repeat rnds 3 and 4 until all sts on needle 2 have been worked you should have 28 32
